title: Thursday Pt1: Biggest Rams, Bills storylines; Peter & Jason's Super Bowl picks; Texans GM Nick Caserio; Coach of the Year predictions
itunes:title: Thursday Pt1: Biggest Rams, Bills storylines; Peter & Jason's Super Bowl picks; Texans GM Nick Caserio; Coach of the Year predictions
description:
Part One of the Good Morning Football Podcast focuses on the opening night matchup between the Super Bowl champion Los Angeles Rams and Super Bowl favorites Buffalo Bills. Hosts Jamie Erdahl, Kyle Brandt, Peter Schrager, and Super Bowl Champion Jason McCourty share which storyline is the biggest entering the Rams, Bills game. Next, the GMFB hosts predict their coach of the year candidate with Peter, Kyle and Jason selecting first time head coaches to win the award. Later, they’re joined by Houston Texans GM Nick Caserio and he talks about rebuilding the Texans, his experience with Lovie Smith, and the growth of Davis Mills. Part one of the podcast finishes up with Peter and Jason’s Super Bowl picks.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Part One of the Good Morning Football Podcast focuses on the opening night matchup between the Super Bowl champion Los Angeles Rams and Super Bowl favorites Buffalo Bills. Hosts Jamie Erdahl, Kyle Brandt, Peter Schrager, and Super Bowl Champion Jason McCourty share which storyline is the biggest entering the Rams, Bills game. Next, the GMFB hosts predict their coach of the year candidate with Peter, Kyle and Jason selecting first time head coaches to win the award. Later, they’re joined by Houston Texans GM Nick Caserio and he talks about rebuilding the Texans, his experience with Lovie Smith, and the growth of Davis Mills. Part one of the podcast finishes up with Peter and Jason’s Super Bowl picks.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
